paper.title: Pricing Vulnerable Options with Jump Clustering
paper.abstract: This paper presents a valuation of vulnerable European options using a model with self-exciting Hawkes processes that allow for clustered jumps rather than independent jumps. Many existing valuation models can be regarded as special cases of the model proposed here. Using numerical analyses, this study also performs sensitivity analyses and compares the results to those of existing models for European call options. The results show that jump clustering has a significant impact on the option value. (c) 2017 Wiley Periodicals, Inc. Jrl Fut Mark

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心内容是使用Hawkes过程对脆弱欧式期权进行定价，并分析了跳跃聚类对期权价值的影响。这直接涉及衍生品定价领域，特别是期权的估值模型。
